wikipedia_page.main: Ann Jacqueline Hunter CBE FMedSci FBPharmacolS FRSB is a British scientist who is a board director of BenevolentAI. Hunter is also a visiting professor at St George's Hospital Medical School and Imperial College. She is Chair of the Trustees of the Sainsbury Laboratories at Norwich, Chair of the Board of the Stevenage Bioscience Catalyst and Chair of the Board of Brainomix. She was previously CEO of the Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council.
